item.title: New Haven Travel Guide (Greater New Haven/Connecticut/New England/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Explore the best of New Haven with our comprehensive travel guide featuring top attractions, hiking/biking routes, best things to do, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs, safety and health, transportation and logistics, and nearby destinations.
